pages.text: $(bold)$(italic)Island Properties/$$(li)$(bold)Size:/$ Small$(li)$(bold)Stone:/$ Andesite$(li)$(bold)Trees:/$ Oak$(li)$(bold)Plants:/$ Carrot, Rose Bush$(li)$(bold)Animals:/$ Pig$(p)$(bold)$(italic)Notable Features/$$(br)The $(thing)slimes/$ here can be caught in $(item)iron buckets/$, to show you which chunks are $(thing)slime chunks/$, where slimes naturally spawn at Y=40 and below.
